EmailTemplate.name: Retired status
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - Retired status approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have approved your request for retired status.
We will change your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license to Inactive-Retired status on {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_after_License_Expiration_1__c}.
Check with your profession on the doâ€™s and don'ts of retired status.
Questions? Need help? {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Email__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI041
